FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluated.label: Financing Receivable, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluated.description: The balance of financing receivables that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluated.label: Financing Receivable, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluated.description: The balance of financing receivables that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Number of Contracts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.description: Number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Number of Contracts
FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.description: Number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModi.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Post-Modification Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModi.description: Amount of investment in financing receivables (after modification) modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModi.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Postmodification
FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModi.description: Amount, after troubled debt restructuring, of modified financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Pre-Modification Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.description: Amount of investment in financing receivables (before modification) modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Premodification
FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.description: Amount, before troubled debt restructuring, of financing receivable to be modified.

FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring
FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Subsequent Default, Number of Contracts
FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.description: Number of financing receivable contracts modified as troubled debt restructuring within previous 12 months, with subsequent payment default.

FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Subsequent Default, Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.description: Amount of investment related to financing receivables modified by troubled debt restructurings within the previous 12 months, for which there was a payment default.

FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Subsequent Default
FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring within previous 12 months, with subsequent payment default.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment30T.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 30 to 59 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment30T.description: Financing receivables that are less than 60 days past due but more than 29 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment60T.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 60 to 89 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment60T.description: Financing receivables that are less than 90 days past due but more than 59 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.label: Financing Receivable, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.description: Amount of financing receivable 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentCur.label: Financing Receivable, Not Past Due
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentCur.description: Amount of financing receivable not past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentEqu.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, Equal to Greater than 90 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentEqu.description: Financing receivables that are equal to or greater than 90 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentPas.label: Financing Receivable, Past Due
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentPas.description: Amount of financing receivable past due.

FinancingReceivablesImpairedTroubledDebt.label: Financing Receivables, Impaired, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Write-down
FinancingReceivablesImpairedTroubledDebt.description: Reflects the amount of the write-down related to a troubled debt restructuring.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, after Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for asset, excluding financial asset and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

ForeclosedAssets.label: Repossessed Assets
ForeclosedAssets.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance; includes real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts.

FurnitureAndFixturesGross.label: Furniture and Fixtures, Gross
FurnitureAndFixturesGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of equipment commonly used in offices and stores that have no permanent connection to the structure of a building or utilities. Examples include, but are not limited to, desks, chairs, tables, and bookcases.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments, Net, Pretax
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Mortgage Loans
GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertiesNetOfApplicabl.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties, Net of Applicable Income Taxes (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertiesNetOfApplicabl.description: This element represents the amount of gain (loss) on sale of properties during the reporting period net of the applicable income taxes realized.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

GainLossOnSaleOfSecuritiesNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Securities, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
GainLossOnSaleOfSecuritiesNet.description: The net gain (loss) realized from the sale, exchange, redemption, or retirement of securities, not separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity.

GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Loans, Net
GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets for Financial Service Operations
GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Other Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of other real estate owned, increases (decreases) in the valuation allowance for foreclosed real estate, and write-downs of other real estate owned after acquisition or physical possession.

GeneralInsuranceExpense.label: General Insurance Expense
GeneralInsuranceExpense.description: The expense in the period incurred with respect to protection provided by insurance entities against risks other than risks associated with production (which are allocated to cost of sales).

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

HeldToMaturitySecurities.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity
HeldToMaturitySecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAmortizedCostBef.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Amortized Cost, before Other-than-temporary Impairment
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAmortizedCostBef.description: Amount, before other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) accretion, of investment in debt securities measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesNe.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Debt Maturities, Net Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesNe.description: Carrying amount of debt securities accounted for as held-to-maturity, net of adjustments including, but not limited to, accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments (OTTI) recognized, and fair value hedge accounting adjustments.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValueDisclos.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValueDisclos.description: This element represents the portion of the balance sheet assertion valued at fair value by the entity whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission. This item represents investments in debt securities which are categorized as held-to-maturity and that have scheduled maturities more than one year from the balance sheet date or operating cycle, if longer; such investments are normally measured at amortized cost (carrying value) unless circumstances indicate that the value to be recovered from the investment is less than its carried amount. The held-to-maturity category is for those securities that the Company has the positive intent and ability to hold until maturity.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHold.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Unrecognized Holding Gain (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHold.description: Amount of unrecognized gain before loss on investments in held-to-maturity securities.

HeldtomaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHold.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Unrecognized Holding Gain (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
HeldtomaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHold.description: As of the balance sheet date, the excess of fair value over carrying value (amortized cost) of a debt security categorized as held-to-maturity, exclusive of dividend or interest income recognized but not yet received and exclusive of any write-downs for other-than-temporary impairment. Such item represents the gross unrecognized holding gain.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecord.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Average Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecord.description: Average amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Interest Income, Accrual Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.description: Amount of interest income recognized that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.description: Amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Related Allowance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.description: Amount of allowance for credit losses related to recorded investment.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairmentOfInvestments.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments
ImpairmentOfInvestments.description: The amount by which the fair value of an investment is less than the amortized cost basis or carrying amount of that investment at the balance sheet date and the decline in fair value is deemed to be other than temporary, before considering whether or not such amount is recognized in earnings or other comprehensive income.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable, Current
IncomeTaxesReceivable.description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

IncomeTaxReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable
IncomeTaxReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of income taxes previously overpaid to tax authorities (such as U.S. Federal, state and local tax authorities) representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes. Also called income tax refund receivable.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsInvestm.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Investment, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsInvestm.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to investment tax credit.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAdvancePaymentsByBorro.label: Increase (Decrease) in Advance Payments by Borrowers for Taxes and Insurance
IncreaseDecreaseInAdvancePaymentsByBorro.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepayments received from borrowers for taxes and insurance remitted to the appropriate tax authority or insurer on behalf of the borrower.

IncreaseDecreaseInDemandDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Demand Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInDemandDeposits.description: The net cash inflow or outflow in the total of all demand deposits, including checking and negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) accounts, classified as cash flows from financing activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsPurchasedA.label: Increase (Decrease) in Federal Funds Purchased and Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsPurchasedA.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the fund lent to other financial institution arising from the excess in reserve deposited at Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirement. This borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest. Also include cash inflow or outflow from investment sold under the agreement to reacquire such investment.

IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesPayableNetO.label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Payable, Net of Income Taxes Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesPayableNetO.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings, net of amounts receivable from taxing authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in income taxes receivable, which represents the amount due from tax authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayableAn.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayableAn.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other obligations or expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesUnderRepurchas.label: Increase (Decrease) in Payables under Repurchase Agreements
IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesUnderRepurchas.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability under agreements to repurchase securities that were sold.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Time Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits.description: Net cash inflow (outflow) of time deposits.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCal.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Call Options and Warrants
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCal.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of call options and warrants using the treasury stock method.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing.label: Information Technology and Data Processing
InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing.description: The amount of expenses incurred in the period for information technology and data processing products and services.

IntangibleAssetsNetIncludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Including Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetIncludingGoodwill.description: Carrying amount of finite-lived intangible assets, indefinite-lived intangible assets and goodwill. Goodwill is an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized. Intangible assets are assets, not including financial assets, lacking physical substance.

InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.label: Interest and Dividend Income, Operating
InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.description: Represents the total of interest and dividend income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, earned from (1) loans and leases whether held-for-sale or held-in-portfolio; (2) investment securities; (3) federal funds sold; (4) securities purchased under agreements to resell; (5) investments in banker's acceptances, commercial paper, or certificates of deposit; (6) dividend income; or (7) other investments not otherwise specified herein.

InterestAndDividendIncomeSecurities.label: Interest and Dividend Income, Securities, Operating
InterestAndDividendIncomeSecurities.description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.label: Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks and Other Financial Institutions
InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.description: For banks and other depository institutions (including Federal Reserve Banks, if applicable): Interest-bearing deposits in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits, which are presented separately from cash on the balance sheet.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositBrokered.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Brokered
InterestBearingDomesticDepositBrokered.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic third-party deposits placed by or through the assistance of a deposit broker, also known as brokered deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificat.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Certificates of Deposits
InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificat.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic certificate of deposit liabilities.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Deposits
InterestExpenseDeposits.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitie.label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Withdrawal Penalties
InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitie.description: Early withdrawal penalties on domestic deposits which discourage customer withdrawal prior to maturity.

InterestExpenseFederalHomeLoanBankAndFed.label: Interest Expense, Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank Advances, Short-term
InterestExpenseFederalHomeLoanBankAndFed.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on short-term borrowings associated with Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances.

InterestExpenseMoneyMarketDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Money Market Deposits
InterestExpenseMoneyMarketDeposits.description: Interest expense incurred on all money market deposits.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InterestExpenseOtherDomesticDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Other Domestic Deposits
InterestExpenseOtherDomesticDeposits.description: Interest expense incurred on other deposits in domestic offices.

InterestExpenseSavingsDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Savings Deposits
InterestExpenseSavingsDeposits.description: Interest expense incurred on all savings account deposits.

InterestExpenseSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreem.label: Interest Expense, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
InterestExpenseSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreem.description: Gross expenses on securities sold coupled with an agreement to repurchase the same from the same counterparty at a fixed or determinable price within a fixed or variable time period.

InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDeben.label: Interest Expense, Subordinated Notes and Debentures
InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDeben.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on subordinated notes and debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

InterestExpenseTimeDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Time Deposits
InterestExpenseTimeDeposits.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, in domestic offices.

InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.label: Interest Income (Expense), after Provision for Loan Loss
InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestIncomeOther.label: Interest Income, Other
InterestIncomeOther.description: Amount of interest income earned from interest bearing assets classified as other.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Interest Payable
InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InvestmentInFederalHomeLoanBankStockFair.label: Investment in Federal Home Loan Bank Stock, Fair Value Disclosure
InvestmentInFederalHomeLoanBankStockFair.description: Fair value portion of investments in Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) stock.

LaborAndRelatedExpense.label: Labor and Related Expense
LaborAndRelatedExpense.description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.

Land.label: Land
Land.description: Amount before accumulated depletion of real estate held for productive use, excluding land held for sale.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LeaseholdImprovementsGross.label: Leasehold Improvements, Gross
LeaseholdImprovementsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of additions or improvements to assets held under a lease arrangement.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

LesseeFinanceLeaseDiscountRate.label: Lessee, Finance Lease, Discount Rate
LesseeFinanceLeaseDiscountRate.description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of finance lease payments.

LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Discount Rate
LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate.description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of operating lease payments.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.description: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LifeInsuranceCorporateOrBankOwnedAmount.label: Life Insurance, Corporate or Bank Owned, Amount
LifeInsuranceCorporateOrBankOwnedAmount.description: This item represents the amount that could be realized under a life insurance contract or contracts owned by the Entity as of the date of the statement of financial position. Such Entity-owned life insurance policies are commonly known as corporate-owned life insurance (COLI) or bank-owned life insurance (BOLI).

LineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit
LineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, reflects the carrying amount of unpaid loan amounts due from related parties at the balance sheet date.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesAd.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Additions
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesAd.description: Reflects the amount of new advances made to related parties in the form of loan and lease receivables.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesCo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Collections (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesCo.description: Reflects the amount of collections received from related parties to reduce the carrying amounts of loans and leases receivable due from them.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesPr.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Proceeds
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesPr.description: Amount of cash inflow from related parties which reduce the amount of loans and leases receivable due from related parties.

LoansHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Held-for-sale, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loans held-for-sale including, but not limited to, mortgage loans and finance receivables.

LoansHeldForSaleMortgages.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Mortgage Loans (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
LoansHeldForSaleMortgages.description: Amount classified as mortgage loans attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDi.label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, after Valuation Allowance
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDi.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of financing receivable held for sale and not part of disposal group. Excludes loan covered under loss sharing agreement and loan classified as investment in debt security.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDi.label: Loans Receivable Held-for-sale, Net, Not Part of Disposal Group, Mortgage (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDi.description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of mortgage loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

MortgagesHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure.label: Mortgages Held-for-sale, Fair Value Disclosure
MortgagesHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of mortgage loans held-for-sale.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDome.label: Noninterest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Domestic
NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDome.description: Amount of domestic noninterest-bearing deposits held by the entity, which may include demand deposits, checking, brokered and retail deposits.

NoninterestExpense.label: Noninterest Expense
NoninterestExpense.description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

NoninterestExpenseDirectorsFees.label: Noninterest Expense Directors Fees
NoninterestExpenseDirectorsFees.description: Noninterest expense related to directors' fees which are fees paid by an Entity to its directors. Directors' fees may be paid in addition to salary and other benefits.

NoninterestIncome.label: Noninterest Income
NoninterestIncome.description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.

NoninterestIncomeOther.label: Noninterest Income, Other
NoninterestIncomeOther.description: Represents the total of noninterest income derived from certain activities and assets including (for example): (1) venture capital investments; (2) bank owned life insurance; (3) foreign currency transactions; and (4) mortgage servicing rights.

NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotionalAmountOfInterestRateDerivatives.label: Notional Amount of Interest Rate Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NotionalAmountOfInterestRateDerivatives.description: Aggregate notional amount of interest rate derivatives, which relates to the currency amount specified in the interest rate derivative instruments.

OccupancyNet.label: Occupancy, Net
OccupancyNet.description: Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Tax effect of the change in accumulated other comprehensive income, that is, the tax effect on items included in other comprehensive income during the period that is attributable to the parent entity. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for gains or losses realized upon the sale of securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherInterestAndDividendIncome.label: Other Interest and Dividend Income
OtherInterestAndDividendIncome.description: Amount, after discount, accretion and premium amortization, of interest income and dividend income classified as other.

OtherNoninterestExpense.label: Other Noninterest Expense
OtherNoninterestExpense.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

PaymentsForFederalHomeLoanBankAdvances.label: Payments for FHLBank Advance, Investing Activities
PaymentsForFederalHomeLoanBankAdvances.description: Amount of cash outflow for disbursement to borrower related to advance, made by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), classified as investing activity.

PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.label: Payments for Origination of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

PaymentsForProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBa.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
PaymentsForProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBa.description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) from acquisition (sale) of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) stock.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans and Leases
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemablePreferr.label: Payments for Repurchase of Redeemable Preferred Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemablePreferr.description: The cash outflow for reacquisition of callable preferred stock.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfWarrants.label: Payments for Repurchase of Warrants
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfWarrants.description: The aggregate amount paid by the entity to reacquire the right to purchase equity shares at a predetermined price, usually issued together with corporate debt.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireFederalHomeLoanBankStoc.label: Payments to Acquire Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
PaymentsToAcquireFederalHomeLoanBankStoc.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock.

PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Payment to Acquire Life Insurance Policy, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Demand
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Money Market
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Notice of Withdrawal
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic notice of withdrawal demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Savings
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Time Deposits
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic time deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PostageExpense.label: Postage Expense
PostageExpense.description: Amount of expense associated with postage.

PreferredStockAccretionOfRedemptionDisco.label: Preferred Stock, Accretion of Redemption Discount
PreferredStockAccretionOfRedemptionDisco.description: The amount of accretion of the preferred stock redemption discount during the period.

PreferredStockAmountOfPreferredDividends.label: Preferred Stock, Amount of Preferred Dividends in Arrears
PreferredStockAmountOfPreferredDividends.description: Aggregate amount of cumulative preferred dividends in arrears.

PreferredStockDiscountOnShares.label: Preferred Stock, Discount on Shares
PreferredStockDiscountOnShares.description: Discount on preferred shares, or any unamortized balance thereof, shown separately as a deduction from the applicable account(s) as circumstances require.

PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.label: Preferred Stock, Dividend Rate, Percentage
PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.description: The percentage rate used to calculate dividend payments on preferred stock.

PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustmen.label: Preferred Stock Dividends and Other Adjustments
PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustmen.description: The aggregate value of preferred stock dividends and other adjustments necessary to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.label: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference Per Share
PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockRedemptionAmount.label: Preferred Stock, Redemption Amount
PreferredStockRedemptionAmount.description: The redemption (or callable) amount of currently redeemable preferred stock. Includes amounts representing dividends not currently declared or paid but which will be payable under the redemption features or for which ultimate payment is solely within the control of the issuer.

PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Redemption Price Per Share
PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare.description: The price per share at which the preferred stock of an entity that has priority over common stock in the distribution of dividends and in the event of liquidation of the entity is redeemed or may be called at. The redemption features of this preferred stock are solely within the control of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

PrepaymentFeesOnAdvancesNet.label: Prepayment Fees on Advances, Net
PrepaymentFeesOnAdvancesNet.description: Amount of income earned, after hedging basis adjustments, from fees charged for prepayment of certain Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances before original maturity.

ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankAdvances.label: Proceeds from FHLBank Advance, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankAdvances.description: Amount of cash inflow from collection of advance by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), classified as investing activity.

ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.label: Proceeds from FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.description: Amount of cash inflow from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfMediumTermNotes.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Medium-term Notes
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfMediumTermNotes.description: The cash inflow from a debt funding received on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Including Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, option exercised.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTe.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Subordinated Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTe.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
